description: Building on its reputation of excellence, Athena TECHNOLOGIES is proud to offer the iVoice iPod speaker dock. This innovative speaker dock was designed from the ground up to perform to real world expectations. This means it plays loud, sounds spectacular, and will perform that way for years.The iVoice is a wall-mountable speaker dock that offers a video output to hook up an external display device, an auxiliary input for most MP3 players or a computer. This ingenious iPod speaker dock lets you charge and operate your iPod simultaneously, and even offers the flexibility of a wireless remote control. The iVoice features a USB interface allowing you to retain all the functionality when using iTunes without having to remove your iPod from the dock.Unlike other systems, the iVoice has no cumbersome power adapter so you'll be able to enjoy its good looks. The clean angled design and high gloss black cabinet will complement your dcor while the crystal clear direct radiating digital audio will simply amaze you.The USB connection on the iVoice is not compatible with the iPhone or iPod Touch
title: Athena iVoice Direct Radiating Dock & Sound System for iPod
